website_summaries.verdict: This product is ideal for people who want to cover up their outlets with something functional when they aren’t in use.
pros: People love the brushed bronze design that shows light through a tree design
Allows you to cover both outlets or leave one accessible
Features light-sensor technology so it automatically turns on when ambient light gets low
cons: Needs to be manually unplugged if it’s in a space that doesn’t get natural light during the day

customer_reviews.title: Brownie Points
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife - who wanted a nightlight in the bathroom - and she loved it Upside, I got brownie points Downside, she wants 4 more ....
customer_reviews.author: Bill Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great looks. Amazing night light.
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. The trellis design is amazing and the color is very smart. The light activates automatically based on ambient low light. The lumens is also very adequate for a medium sized area. Not too bright and not too dim. Perfect for keeping it on at night and doesn't bother your sleep at all. Another cool part is how you can use it to cover up an entire outlet for unused sockets. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharif S.

customer_reviews.title: STOP and buy these lights now!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. While they are more than the typical white plastic ones from Walmart, they are fantastic. I’ve waited for a while then I finally purchased them. I don’t know why I waited so long. They look great under my kitchen cabinets and the entry hall. I would buy 20 for all around the house. UPDATE- 5 months later and they work perfectly. I have 4 and waiting on my 5th was to be delivered today. Great for the bathroom as well and now the new one for under the kitchen island so it lights up the wal at night.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Bargin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The front of the light is great, very pretty...BUT there is no cover over the back part, so light streams around from all sides. Almost as much light comes from the sides as from the front. Looks stupid - like it's an unfinished nightlight - which imo it is. Will not buy more. I'll use it behind furniture, where the extra glow won't look strange. If it had an opaque backing piece, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Varney

customer_reviews.title: Tree Of Life Night Light-Yes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...nicer than you think it will be.. Only minor issue: to widen the prongs so the light fits upright and snug in your electrical outlet, you will most likely need to use pliers or a tool of some sort-it's that solid. Although light is 'white light' (as opposed to amber, red, green, etc.), it is a 'warm' light and not too bright or harsh to the eyes. Installed in bathroom (MY bathroom). Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Old School Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great night light
customer_reviews.text: This light is great! I love the tree design. The brushed copper color looks classy. It is large enough to cover both sockets when plugged into the bottom one. It also has plenty of space for something else when plugged into the top socket. It has a light sensor so it turns off during the day and when I turn on the room light. I keep it in my bathroom. It is bright enough to see the room in the middle of the night but dim enough to not create wakefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for my indoor tile stairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: These nights are fantastic!! They are led and provide so much light with such a reduction ln energy! I love these so much I have 2 on our tile stairs (provides so much light without any lights on during the night so you wont slip), 1 in our son's bathroom and another in his room by his bunk bed so he can see going up the ladder. I will never buy any other kind of nightlight. They are so cute and are modern stainless steel looking to match our home!
customer_reviews.author: Onefitmom

customer_reviews.title: Medium brightness, aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I like these nightlights for larger, public areas. They are fairly bright, more so than my wife and I would like in a bedroom, but they're great for lighting the way during late night trips to other areas of the house. Their design compliments the rest of our decor well, which was the main reason I selected these. They do not detect motion, but they sense the ambient light and turn on only when it diminishes past a certain point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris LTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive, and larger than I expected. A lot of reviews think the light is too dim, but I am the opposite. I got this for the middle of the night trips to the bathroom, don't want too much light or it would be hard to go back to sleep. It puts out more light than necessary to use the bathroom. The style is why I really love it. As a side note, the light tended to lean out just a tad from the wall so I turned it upside down and now it hugs the wall. I put another one in my powder room and it is fine right side up, as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking nightlights that work very well. Not too bright or too little brightness. The brushed nickel finished matches the fixtures in my house. The best thing about these is that they automatically turn off when it is light and turn on when it is dark. So I have one in the hallway and one in the bathroom to make it easier in case someone needs to go to the bathroom at night, and I don't even have to worry about turning them on or off. They are also LED so the bulbs are not going to burn out. GE is a trusted brand and these are UL safety tested. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StillWaters

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Complete plastic with a brushed-nickle look finish. Priced accordingly. Looks way better than most standard plug-ins you'd pick up at the store. I got the two-pack. I needed a light for the hallway so the kids could find the bathroom without bumping into walls at night. The second one was going to go in the girls room for a night light, but the area I wanted it is always shaded - thus the light would be on too often. So, I moved it to the 'mancave' on a wall and it is awesome. Actually saved me from having to get a small lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Frost

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking nightlight which I am using in the master bath. I have a quatrefoil print in my bathroom accessories and this matches very well. It is bright enough to really make a difference but dim enough not to be intrusive. It is well made of plastic and is very light so it stays in place in the plug. There is a sensor which automatically turns it on and off. Be advised that it is not really small. It is a nice size but it could be made in a smaller version which would function the same way. Overall it works for me and I am very happy with this nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: BBB123

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this night light because it was attractive and LED, so would last longer. It quit after ten months, while my much older other non LED lights are still going strong. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty decorative light
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I have it in my kitchen to provide a bit of light in case anyone needs to go in there at night. It looks nice and I like that you can cover the other opening if you choose to for decorative purposes. The amount of light is just right for this type of light. Does a good job of only turning on when it is getting dark. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive
customer_reviews.text: These are very responsive and will dim or shut off if you walk by them in the right light in the evening or morning. Its a warm yellowish light that gives just enough so you don't step into the dog in the middle of the night. These can be oriented up or down depending on where your plug is, HOWEVER if you have another plug in the adjacent outlet, the light sensor may not work correctly. These are best to put in unused outlets.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: All of the Lights!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My house is super dark at night. The motion detector is right on as well! I have a pretty narrow hallway, but this light works perfect in the hallway outlet, because it doesn't stick out like other plugins. I have one in my dining room as well. With my house being open concept, this light gives just enough light to all connected rooms. Not to bright, but just bright enough. Great house warming gift. Nobody ever thinks of these until it's completely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Best Subdued Lighting!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different plug in night lights available on Amazon and this one--GE Moroccan LED CoverLite, Brushed Nickel Finish-- is my favorite. It is rather large but works for me. I put the plug in lights behind furniture (that is spaced a few inches from the wall) in the living room and in my office. I like when the light washes the wall. And unlike some night lights I tried, this is a warm white; no blue cast! It's subtle yet very effective. Also went crazy putting them in the kitchen where someone could easily stumble in the dark. Nice quality and designs. Price is certainly right too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Love these - much better than my former nightlights
customer_reviews.text: I used to keep several "small" lights on in the house at night, but decided that was wasteful. Got this 4 pack and spread them throughout the house and it was a perfect solution. The covers are pretty. They are light sensitive and come on automatically. I would not keep one in a bedroom because the brightness is too strong for that, but in a hallway near the bedrooms would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Nightlights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my business after we got broken into. They now light up the whole shop at night nicely at night. A pretty glow along the lower level of the wall. We are on a busy street, in a big city, so they also are very pretty. Aesthetically they are very pleasing to the eye. They turn on at night and go off in the morning. They are never on when we are open. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little light
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today very nice, but the description says covers the plate, well it almost does, there is anout an inch or a little more it does not. Now what would be ideal is move the plug inside the cover up a little bit so it would indeed cover and hide the whole wall plate. I still love it regardless but this would be a plus to change this. You dont need to see the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Oderkirk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, decorative night lights.
customer_reviews.text: I am in an apartment where I don’t want to have all of my lights on all the time when I’m out. These night lights were beautiful and fit the bill. The lighting is ambient enough that I can see by it but it’s not glaring. I love the efficiency of the LED bulbs. I love them so much I bought another set. These are wonderful I hope you will consider purchasing them for your home or office.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalMama

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these night lights before and I think they’re great. Unlike other ones I’ve tried, the light sensor is much better. Just enough light to see, but not too bright. And they look nice too. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this night light!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite night light. I couldn’t say enough good things about it. The motion detection is very accurate. The brightness is just enough to give you enough light to walk around comfortable at night without turning on lights and waking people. They definitely seem energy efficient as when you turn the light on that’s in the room they immediately go out. I originally bought one 3 years ago and it hadn’t died yet. They also look very nice and eloquent to be a night light if it is going to be seen. I’ve had guest as about it because they like the look of it. 5 out of 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but cheap!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the left is the one (actually it's a pack of two) that recently arrived; the one on the right is one I bought a while back and I liked it so well I wanted to post it too (I believe they're the same price, same company). These are made out of plastic, but it doesn't look like it. When you get them, you can plug them in right away, no bulb needed. I don't know how long they last, but I've had the one on the right in a dark bathroom, so it's on most of the time, for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: CWBowers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great idea.. but HORRIBLE quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and a great idea but very cheaply made. The prongs on the light loosen out of outlet and won’t stay in the wall after less than a month of use. I bought a single, double pack & a 4 pack at different times. After 3 separate purchases I think those are enough attempts to deem this as not being worth while. But gorgeous! Just needs to be executed better by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Large night light set
customer_reviews.text: I can not comment on how well they worked as I returned without using the night lights. They were very large and not to my liking. I was looking for a good night light that was not obtrusive. This product did not meet what I was looking for. However, if you are looking for a larger size night light I think you may be happy with this product,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights well
customer_reviews.text: Bought a two pack for two of our restrooms and they work really well. Taking a little adjustment time to get used to the one in our master bath as it is bright enough that the entire room is well lit and visible from our bed. Nice that our other socket is still useable with this light in place as it is the only outlet in the entire bathroom. Seems to hold itself upright well in the socket also.
customer_reviews.author: Foxxychevy

customer_reviews.title: Much Nicer Nightlight Option
customer_reviews.text: Still simple plastic nightlights but these look much nicer than the cheapies. Now our dog no longer knocks the cover off sending it flying across the room. My only complaint is that on our 2 way switches (2 plugs and 2 light switches in the same pannel) this night light impedes the switches from being turned on and off. Shouldnt be an issue for 95% of other households. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love This Nightlight!
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible to love a nightlight? Because I love this one. It looks great during the day and even better at night. The design and finish are awesome. It looks kind of like a snowflake to me, which is perfect for the winter months, but since GE calls it floral, it's perfect for the other seasons, too! It provides an ample amount of light so you don't need to turn on a regular light in the middle of the night. In fact, it's slightly brighter than the other nightlights we've had. It also gives off an awesome design when lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a darker color than I expected, which I'm very happy about. The light is soft but also strong enough to light pathways. The night lights are also quite sensitive to light. They stay off with the slightest detection of daylight, but automatically turn on without light. I uploaded a picture of the nightlight in my bathroom during the day, to show that it comes on when the door is closed and the lights are off, then turns off when the door is open and the lights are still off. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SAH87

customer_reviews.title: Not one of those blinding white LED's
customer_reviews.text: Gives off just enough a soft glowing light in the bathroom to see what you need to at night. Not to where it blinds you like some others do. The Frosted lens does the trick for sure. Appreciate the fact it stays off during the day, but comes on at dusk. No batteries to worry about. It's quite large...... almost the size of a deck of cards. This one has a nice curve to it. The 2 prong plug end is at the lower end of the unit where the sensor is........ so it will free up at least one other socket for you to use......ie shaver or hair dryer/curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: LwosTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I Have One in Every Room
customer_reviews.text: I started out with only 1 of these to try, and now I think I have one in every room; the bathroom, hallways, kitchen, dining room, etc. They work great, offering a bright soft light at night time. Not to mention I think they are very attractive. I've had my oldest for over a year and its still going strong. If you need a nightlight absolutely try this one!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Another great amazon buy! Bought this to eliminate struggling to turn hall light on when carrying my daughter to bed. Perfect level of brightness. I can see where I'm going, but doesn't wake her up. Motion sensor is very sensitive, so it comes on before I get to top of steps without having to dance around to make it turn on. Also very attractive. Doesnt look cheap or tacky at all. Love it and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and bright
customer_reviews.text: This is not only a pretty night light, but it is bright. If you want a bright night light, this is it... it also sets off a light "beam" on the wall. It is nice, if you don't mind brightness. It is set in a very dark large room, so it definitely does the trick for us, no bumping into chairs or couches or tripping on dog or toys.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice happy with product recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pretty bright picture above is why I bought this.. black cat Bootsy is going to take me down at night on way to bathroom.. now I can see the little son of a gun 🤣😁😝
customer_reviews.author: Beth a.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute - I ordered two. It surprised me that I did not see a lightbulb, but there is an LED light that is simply non traditional. It is light sensitive so it comes on at night and turns itself off in morning. To me, it’s a soft light rather than really bright. It’s very pretty and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LitlLotty

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase however it is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this five stars. When the person I gave it to his head it was great. However some friends went over to the house and it won't stop buzzing so we definitely threw it out prior to that I had purchased another one it wouldn't light up at all. So I'm taking away my five stars giving it to due to the fact that it is pretty
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: To Bend or Not to. Bend, that’s the question.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I rated this w/only 4 stars is because if you DONT slightly bend one of the 2 prongs to make it a little wider, it’ll sag, like its fixin to fall. Nobody wants that look. I bought the pack. I love ‘em, but I DID have to spread them open just enough that it “holds tightly.” This makes a little hard to plug in, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tracking system
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I wanted and needed, followed the map and went downstairs to meet your driver, thanks God I went down, he was in the wrong door, I opened and I guess he was surprised that I was down so quickly, thanks to your map, I have been tracking him since I saw that he was 7 stops from me, told him that he needed to come in the front door, I was watching for his truck. Thanks, will shop again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Babbie Miqueli

customer_reviews.title: Dim and wide, but it works ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not very bright. I have this in my bathroom so I don't have to turn on the light if I get up at night. When my eyes are adjusted to the dark, it's fine. But it's pretty dim. It's also really wide which doesn't fit very well in the plugs in my bathroom. I had to use an extension cord and put it elsewhere. That's something to keep in mind if you're working with a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Automatically turns on when it gets dark enough and matched our decor well. There are no batteries - we freaked out at first thinking it was a defective light but when we plugged it in and it got dark it lit up on its own! We have a noisy bathroom fan that's connected to the light so late at night you wake up half the house if you use that bathroom! Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo. Break it out of the package and plug right in, no fuss! I love that it turns on and off with the light sensitivity around it, I don't find it on when it shouldn't be or off when it shouldn't be. The light is brighter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture...
customer_reviews.text: They must have abruptly changed their product because I can I assure you what I got, looked WAY cheaper than what was depicted (even in the review photos). It reaked of plastic cheapness to the point where I bought a 10 dollar can of Rustoleum Hammered Pewter spray paint to upgrade the appearance. The paint cost as much as the light itself. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great nightlight. I got one for the bathroom so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great nightlight. I got one for the bathroom so I don't have to turn on the blinding overhead lights in the middle of the night. This little light puts out the perfect amount of brightness and I like the soft LED glow. The design is pretty and much more aesthetically pleasing than other nightlights in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pattern, love the auto-light sensing feature
customer_reviews.text: I now own 5 of these, scattered throughout my house. I love the Moroccan trellis pattern. I also love the auto light-sensing feature, which works very well. There is one light in a sheltered corner that comes on during the day when there's no sunlight but that's okay with me. They shed enough light to illuminate my path so I don't have to turn on a light at night. They're particularly useful when I'm going upstairs for the night - I turn off all the main lights downstairs and these nightlights guide my way to the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Snap PeasTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: What a great nightlight! Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: What a great nightlight! Very happy with purchase. Looks nice and is large enough to cover both outlets if that is desired. I love that they are automatic and cut on depending on how dark it is in the room. My husband does not like this feature, I guess it depends on your preference. Our old ones were like this also, but these are much brighter so I guess it stands out more. Would definitely recommend this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Carr

customer_reviews.title: Dusk to dawn sensor, not so great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a dusk to dawn highlight and the sensor is on the bottom of this unit, so if you have a plug in the socket below it, it seems to have trouble deciding if it’s day or night. So it works best if it’s in an outlet by itself. The item is as described, but it looks much cheaper in person. If you’re limited on electrical outlets then you might want to consider a different light that has a sensor for dusk to dawn on the front or top of the unit. This one on the bottom is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl817

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Was nicely surprised to see the night lite was as beautiful as it was shown. It works great and lights up the entire room. I stay up late at night and have balance issues. This night lite helps me make it to my bedroom without bumping or tripping over anything. The price was very reasonable also.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Capwell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter when she comes home late at night from work instead of leaving an actual light on for her. Our house is super dark so these were perfect. They are a little brighter than I thought but I don’t have to worry about turning anything off and wasting electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and sensor works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product & so pretty! I purchased this as a nightlight for my cockatiel, in order to try & avoid night terrors. The sensor works great, so it is very energy efficient. It turns on when the house starts getting dark. During the night it is bright enough to light up our entire living room area, but not to the point where it would be too bright & bothersome. It was nicely packaged, however My only complaint is that the plug itself was bent, to the point where I had to manually bend it in place in order to be able to smoothly plug it in to the outlet (pictured). Other than that, great product at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This night light does the job! I'm glad I decided to purchase it. I use it in my bathroom to be able to see in the middle of the night. It produces enough light so I can actually get around without breaking my neck. I love that it senses when it's dark and instantly comes to life. It remains off during the day or if the light in the room is switched on. I will be purchasing more to place throughout my home.
customer_reviews.author: katrina french

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty and really effective. They are SO sensitive to diminishing light - to the point where if you take a step to side and put them in shadow they flip on! They definitely create adequate light too - enough to light the hallway and to make it so my daughter doesn’t have to turn on the light in her bathroom in the middle of the night, but the light is golden and muted so it’s not annoying at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelagh Powers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and Just right light!
customer_reviews.text: Nightlight looks super nice when they are both on and off. It gives off just the right amount of light at night to not be glaring but to cast a soft light throughout the room. I can easily sleep with this light on in the room without being distracted by the light. This would actually make a nice gift for someone as well! I will definitely buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish They Were Soft White
customer_reviews.text: LED lights, efficient. I just wish they were soft white. It'd be easier on my eyes and compliment the design better, IMO. One lamp illuminates the living room quite well - perfect for if you don't want to trip over anything but not as bright as a lamp. Perfect for hallways or bathrooms. They are a nice--the Mrs. approves!
customer_reviews.author: American Panda

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the low price!
customer_reviews.text: Light purchased in March 2018 and stopped working July 2018. Not worth it. Night lights with bulbs lasted 4+ years before needing a new bulb. Also, light stays on 24 hours. Will go back to the tried and true night light.
customer_reviews.author: lynn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is plastic, it doesn't look cheap. I have a white kitchen with stainless steel appliances and backsplash between the slide-in stove and microwave. This little night light looks great and is bright enough. I've actually receive compliments on it and have been asked when I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal92672

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little attractive nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Attractive and just the right amount of light for a living room, bathroom or hallway. They only come on when it’s dark. You can plug them in to cover the whole outlet plate, or leave one outlet exposed for other appliances. I also like that there is a variety of patterns and finishes to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice & does the job
customer_reviews.text: We placed this light in our bathroom by the sink. It looks very nice and provides a decent amount of soft light which allows you to use the bathroom in the middle of the night without having to turn the light on. The sensor works perfectly and goes off only after there is a solid amount of light coming in the bathroom window in the morning. For the price...I think its a very nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JMuss

customer_reviews.title: A fine simple product!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 of these, and 12 "GE LED CandleLite Night Light, Oil-Rubbed Bronze" items (). These are brighter and a whiter light, which we use for stairways and door areas. We use the darker, warmer candle lights to create ambience throughout our home at night. The auto feature has worked flawlessly for 3 months now. Note that the both of these products completely cover the power receptacle, which we consider a good thing, as they are more decorative than a bunch of white plastic plates around the house. A fine simple product!
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, with a perfect amount of light
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful night lights, I love the pattern and finish on them - very elegant. The amount of light it produces is perfect - not overly bright or dim. It's enough to help me see at night, while not being too distracting to my boyfriend who hates bright night lights. The sensors on it are pretty accurate. I may buy more!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The device is larger than I expected and much more handsome. It illuminates not only my bathroom but about 2/3 of the hallway leading to it, making it much more difficult to trip over a cat on those 2 am walks to the bathroom. Exceptionally good.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Enough light to find your way but not enough to wake you up.
customer_reviews.text: We have put this nightlight in our guest bathroom to help guide overnight visitors to our house. It puts out enough light to be a guide, but it is soft enough that it's not blinding. It's also very pretty, just like the picture. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: These are not a yellow light
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these and the motion detection feature is really nice, however they are not the yellow light shown in the initial photo. They are bright white, which means they put out too much light in the master bathroom near where I sleep, so I have to put something down in front of the door. Awesome in the guest bathroom though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Litchfield

customer_reviews.title: Leans away from the wall at the tops, unsightly.
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t sit flat against the wall, instead the tops leaned away from the wall plug. Looked ugly leaning away from the wall. Went with the smaller square model which emits the exact same amount of light and didn’t lean away from the walls
customer_reviews.author: m s

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. One for the basement, one for the first floor, and one for the second. The design is beautiful and it gives off a bright light, but not too bright. It does a sufficient job lighting up the hallway. I'd say it's a bit TOO bright for a room, for me personally, but it's great for spacious areas.
customer_reviews.author: Plunderbunny

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item because one of the comments online stated that it was perfect light not too bright not too dim. I totally disagree. It was way too bright for me! I did not return them I will use them in the future for perhaps a hallway or something but for in the bedroom I got a really nice one for a dollar that included motion detector at the dollar store which I am very happy with
customer_reviews.author: Carole M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these nightlights!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in my home and they are wonderful to have! Though they are not as bright as I thought, they are super efficient! No more constant blinking from a regular nightlight, just comes on once and stays on and vice versa. It's also very elegant looking and I love their accent in my home. Will buy more if in need for more :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Jeppesen

customer_reviews.title: Bright and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The LED light makes this brighter than the average night light, which is perfect or what I needed. Be sure to read the description carefully, this is not a motion sensor light. If you're looking for a night light that comes on automatically when the sun goes down and brightens those dark corners then this is exactly what you need. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Code3Ron

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason they never show an image of its back
customer_reviews.text: Turn around the product and see its back, wait, there is no back plate. From the front side it looks ok (not well made, but ok), but there is no backplate and the plug looks really fragile.
customer_reviews.author: crafty0710

customer_reviews.title: Great but pretty bright
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing but honestly depending on where you put them at, they can be too bright. I had one in my hallway and we sometimes leave our master bedroom door open to let air in. I prefer darkness when I sleep and the light (from literally down at the end of the hall) was too bright! It’s great downstairs and in kitchen but too bright in rooms for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Sensor broken?
customer_reviews.text: Sensor is either broken or not sensitive enough. It stays on even when all the lights are on. I'll still keep it to use as a night light but the whole reason I bought it was because I was looking for ways to save on energy costs. Oh well, it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and just the right amount of light. I put one in my main hallway and one in my master bath. For the latter, it provides just enough light for a middle-of-the-night visit without flooding my bedroom with unwanted brightness. I'm glad I purchased. Will probably purchase one more set. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good night lights so far
customer_reviews.text: Weve had these for a month now and they still work well. For the price to get two, it's a good deal. Only thing I was mildly disappointed in was that they are all plastic. The metal looking plate is plastic but still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Monica SC Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this light. The motion feature works as promised and it's the right level of brightness for my room. The elegant look fits right into my room decor. I definitely recommend if you're looking for an 'adult' nightlight to jazz up your space.
customer_reviews.author: EP79

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for the house!
customer_reviews.text: I needed night lights for the house but wanted something with style. These were prefect. Are actually very bright but not overpowering. Nice stylish look for during the day to match the home decor. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Catkittypurr

customer_reviews.title: Illumination
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the fact that it doesn't have to be turn on and off. I wish that I would have really read the description, because I would have known that it was plastic and not metal. It is still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these night lights! I live that it came with two and they are great at detecting light so it cuts off perfectly! I’ll probably buy two more Bc of the look and feel of these! No regrets ..... great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Byrd House

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as good as the picture. Automatically turns on when it's dark and off when it's light. I put it in the bathroom and the night light is bright enough that in the middle of the night you don't have to turn on the regular light if you don't want to.
customer_reviews.author: MMM in Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Not from This seller🥺
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this item, but sorry to say this one was pretty but a dud. For an item like this it has to come out the Amazon box working.
customer_reviews.author: YHart

customer_reviews.title: Charge of the Light Brigade
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit sensitive to light - I think it's on more often than it needs to be, but it's definitely pretty. I put this light on an outlet in my dining room to prevent me from walking into walls in the middle of the night. It doesn't run hot and I like that it's LED so it's more energy efficient than the plug-ins of yore.
customer_reviews.author: The Wright Family

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but......
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this a couple week now. It’s beautiful.....BUT, the light has stopped working on two occasions so far. Eventually came back on after unplugging and plugging back in. I noticed a couple other buyers had the same problem. : /
customer_reviews.author: MR. REALITY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fits over the oulet. These are actually decently bright to where you can see in the dark. We use them in the hall for our little one whose room is at the end. The detect sunlight and automatically shut off and when its dark they turn on. We are going to be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, energy efficient lights—perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are exactly what I was looking for. They are attractive and should be energy efficient because they're LED and they turn on and off based on the amount of light in the area. They feel kind of cheap, but no one is going to go around feeling night lights. The only other negative I can see is that the bulbs aren't replaceable. But they are perfect for my needs. In fact, I've already ordered more to place in other areas of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer, I was so happy with my first batch of several of these nightlights. These last and look nice. I didn't want the same ole same ole run of the mill plastic night lights. These add a touch of niceness to the wall when plugged in. IF you like dimmer lights these are perfect. They are not super bright but cast a nice soft glow.
customer_reviews.author: LilyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely appointed shell, for a very soft night lite. It took some getting used to the whiteness of the glow (led). But they do their job and look great doing it. Looks wise; they enhance! A very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Knows

customer_reviews.title: One did not work, returning through Kohl's a hassle
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return this package through the Kohl's drop off program. Even scanning the emailed return code would not work for them. They refused to take it. Not a great buy when one out of two actually work. The one that does work, is great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: perfect. Just what we needed for the kitchen. The lights in our house are done oddly so it takes you across the kitchen before you can get to the switch. This ensures that no one stubs a toe and gives a little light as needed. It's pretty , too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B. Good

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light to put in the hallway of my apartment, it gives just enough light to see where you're walking so you don't have to fumble around for a light switch. I did order it the first time and it had a defect, but they promptly sent me a replacement with no issue. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lowrance

customer_reviews.title: Never turns off
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if it was motion detector only. Dusk to dawn is always on unless I turn other lights on. Even in the daylight. That is really annoying. UGH... Kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nekoatl

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up your night.. so you don’t trip and fall
customer_reviews.text: It was way too bright depending on the outlet used for a nightlight. But i use it to light my way downstairs and it’s perfect. I used the other on the outlet outside the bathroom so I don’t need to turn on the lights at all.
customer_reviews.author: Super rayray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It provides enough light so that I don't run into things in the middle of the night but not so much that it keeps me awake. The sensor is very sensitive. There is no time lag between turning off the room light and when it turns on,it turns on immediately. If your shadow falls on the light it turns on. Its also very attractive. I definitely recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L. Specht

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom is near the bathroom and we would leave the light on in the bathroom in case we needed to get up in the middle of the night. The bathroom light was bright enough that, even with the door mostly closed, it could still disturb our sleep. This nightlight took care of the situation perfectly and it's good looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Walking Living

customer_reviews.title: love this night lights
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 of these in my house. They are great for those dark hallways and rooms that just need a little bit of light so you don't stub your toe or bang into something! They throw off the just the right amount of light! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: marcia s. jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, but if you can get past that, it's kind of nice
customer_reviews.text: I disliked it at first because there is no switch, it's just on when it's dark enough and off when it's not. The light is very white and the 'copper' is plastic. But it's grown on me because it functions well, but I wonder about replacing the bulb when it burns out because it's on more than I would turn it on myself due to being under a counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't notice the dimensions, or couldn't find them. They come in 2-packs so you get 4 total night lights. They are pretty but huge. 4.5X3 inches. No batteries needed - yay!
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: The motion detection can easily scare you if you forget this is in the room as it can unturned on and off when someone walks past it. But other than that, it looks great and works great. The soft yellow is a perfect light color.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Famularcano

customer_reviews.title: Lovely nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. Once the room darkens or light is blocked the nightlight goes on. It’s bright so I don’t stumble across the room however it doesn’t disturb my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this night light cover. I took the cover off so that I could use it on a "regular" night light because I like to sleep with red light which is better for melatonin production. Worked great. Note that when it arrives it comes with its own light which at first I though was all in one housing. It does separate if you only want to use the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this style night light, I will never by any other kind. During the day it just looks like a pretty outlet cover. I love that it's not ugly! Provides plenty of light in my bathroom so I don't have to turn on any harsh lights and blind myself when I'm half asleep in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E Rick

customer_reviews.title: Light at night!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are working very well and look amazing. They are just what we needed to provide just enough light at night to navigate around the house without turning on the main lights.
customer_reviews.author: van chatham

product_meta.title: GE CoverLite LED Night Light, Plug-in, Dusk to Dawn Sensor, Home Decor, UL-Listed, Ideal for Kitchen, Bathroom, Bedroom, Office, Nursery, Hallway, 29846, 1 Pack, Oil Rubbed Bronze | Tree of Life
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack| Color:Oil Rubbed Bronze | Tree of LifeCover unsightly outlets while providing a soft glow with the GE Tree of Life LED CoverLite night light. This LED night light is designed to fully cover two outlets when one is not in use, though it can be positioned to keep a second outlet free for use. It features light-sensing technology which automatically turns the night light on or off with the changing room light. The long-life LEDs mean there will be no bulbs to replace and it's energy efficient, using just pennies worth of electricity per year. The GE Tree of Life LED CoverLite night light's stylish finish, modern design and always cool-to-the-touch bulbs make it perfect for any room in your home. It is intended for indoor use only. This product is UL listed and comes with a limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Decorative Night Light – Tree design with an oil rubbed bronze finish complements existing décor and brings new life to your home
Automatic On/Off – Light sensing technology allows the night light to turn on at dusk and off at dawn automatically providing light only when needed
Cover Unsightly Outlets – Unique design allows the night light to be positioned to cover the entire outlet, or leave on outlet free for use
Long-life LED – Energy efficient LED means no bulbs to replace and the light source feels cool to the touch, even after extensive use
Safe and Dependable – This reliable night light is UL listed, designed in the USA and is made to last for your peace of mind

specifications.Color: Oil Rubbed Bronze | Tree of Life
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,380 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
